__e: Surely they're not foolish enough to launch a direct assault, my liege.
Please don't tell me you think we're dumb enough to kill the only eyewitness in our own trial.
It's about whether or not we're dumb enough to believe in it that matters.
Even people on the dumb list, like girls.
I don't even know how I did what I did, but I got no problem with goofs like that.
I don't know why God'd take someone like her who should still have a bunch of years left in front of her and lets an old fart like me just go on and on.
Only they're even more stupid than I am, so I gotta think for them.
The Yule. Don´t tell me you´re like these other seasonal ninnies that string Thanksgiving to New Year´s together into one big, annoying holiday.
Well, of all the feather-brained fools I ever saw, you're it.
Isn't there a saying about fools and their money?
It's a fool's errand, and you're anything but.
Well, it has been said by many, most of them fools, and now by you, so... so it must be true.
And then you two bozos chiming in.
When I'm done. Heard one of the simples went for a stroll.
Now, I've had a very long day, and I'm not going to stand here and watch two silly boys kill each other over a door.
Why not the jerks next door?
You guys think that-that I had something to do with his death, you're bigger stooges than I thought.
I don't want this man making a fool of us any more than you do.
Don't you love it when nerds don't know they're nerds?
Only fool can't see it is you.
These suckers wouldn't be here if it wasn't for me.
